McGowan's eyes glimmered as Bombshell's horn was drove through Periwinkle's=
 head. Periwinkle yells and struggles to free herself to no avail. Virgo la=
ughs as Birdbot's 2 grenades click and explode! Papertron's stick of dynami=
te follows the explosion with it's own, equally as big. Both explosions cre=
ate one big fiery blaze heading for the Chivtron base....

OOC: And I have =
a question. Who is in control of the Chivtron base? Because there are many =
shots heading towards it and I'd like it if the attacks were not ignored.
 =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Narrator 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Friday, February 15, 2002 1:05 AM
  Subject: Re: I WILL NOT LEA=
VE TILL THE CHIVTRONS ARE DEAD!


  Barrage aimed a cannon at Periwinkle.

=
  Barrage: One cannonball coming up!

  Bombshell: Wait, Barrage! I haven't=
 got to enslave one person in this whole RPG so far!

  Chop Shop: Enslave =
her for us all!

  Bombshell looks at Periwinkle evilly. He runs at her and=
 then throws himself, trying to stab the pointy tip of his horn into Periwi=
nkle's head!...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    =
To: NBW 
    Sent: Friday, February 15, 2002 12:05 AM
    Subject: I WILL N=
OT LEAVE TILL THE CHIVTRONS ARE DEAD!


    OOC: Yes, I know many are disap=
pointed that I will not leave, so too bad. I will not leave till the chivtr=
ons are terminated. And because of this new rule, only 5 characters, well, =
I know how to solve that.

    IC:

    Fascino, Armada, Venomous, Twister =
and Quake get into a ship and fly away....

    ~~~~~~

    Scan and Zo=EB =
get into their small ship and take off.....

    ~~~~~~

    Hazel, Cerulea=
n and Bronze exit the Chivtron base. They run past the attackers, hoping to=
 avoid being hit.

    Periwinkle: Wait!

    Hazel, Cerulean and Bronze ge=
t into the ship they arrived in, hoping it'll work.

    Periwinkle: Wait!!=


    Periwinkle struggles to stand up, having been hit by all the Insectic=
on's attacks before. The ship takes off. Periwinkle was left alone....

   =
 McGowan smiles and fires a missile at Periwinkle and a missile at the Chiv=
tron base.

    Virgo fires 6 shots and a poison dart at Periwinkle.

    B=
arrymore fires 5 shots at the Chivtron base.

    Lee fires off 2 fireballs=
 towards the Chivtron base.

    Depp fires 5 plasma shots at The Chivtron =
base.

    Birdbot fires off 2 grenades, both landing near the Chivtron bas=
e.

    Papertron throws a lit stick of dynamite near the Chivtron base and=
 fires 8 shots towards the base.

    Periwinkle is struck by all the shots=
 while she watched the ship fly off. She drops to her knees, not paying any=
 attention to the battle...

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the =
Yahoo! Terms of Service.
